TopicTitle: Logitech Saitek Pro X-56 Hotas RGB FC

Articles.Content:
So a friend just showed off his new toy (listed above).  The thing that caught my eye was this:

Designed to enhance the experience of VR gaming and the re-emerging space simulation genre, Logitech G offers the advanced X56 H.O.T.A.S. It’s a shining example of complete control featuring analog thumb sticks, RGB lighting 16-bit aileron and elevator axis, 189 programmable controls, and more.

Aside from KSP and the upcoming sequal... what else is in the "Space Simulation genre"?

 

Also - can you KSP with HOTAS?

Edited December 19, 2020 by JoeSchmuckatelli

EVE online is a very notable space combat sim sort of. Also Elite Dangerous IIRC. Its not a really super big space but its large enough.

Also yes you can for flying (after setting some stuff up in the settings). I dont think building with a HOTAS is very nice.
